title: Chest and Front of Shoulder Stretch

content.title: Chest and Front of Shoulder Stretch Instructions

items: Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Take your right arm and bring it across your chest, placing your hand on your left shoulder.
Use your left hand to gently pull your right elbow towards your left shoulder, feeling a stretch in your chest and front of your right shoulder.
Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, breathing deeply.
Release the stretch and repeat on the other side.
